list.abs: ASLRH may demote the qualification grade of an entrusted demolishing entity that no longer meets the conditions for its present qualification grade .对不符合原定资质等级条件的受托拆迁单位，市国土房管局可以降低其资质等级。
it is proved that complex demolish network , relay bind-up network and initiating network are reliable .从理论上分析证明了复式爆破网路、网络型接力式捆联网路和混联爆破网路是可靠的，能满足工程爆破的要求。

in some neighborhoods , workers demolish old homes with little more than sledgehammers and their bare hands to make way for shopping malls , high-rise apartment complexes and new expressways .在一些社区，工人们仅用长柄铁锤或者徒手拆除旧建筑物，为购物中心、高层公寓住宅楼和新的高速公路项目准备场地。
Erecting or demolishing buildings and structures ;, 建造或者拆除建筑物 , 构筑物;
